text: Hello, I am looking for someone to help me implement a Google font into HubSpot to be used for creating marketing emails.

Hey Cory, just an FYI, many email clients (Gmail, Outlook, and Yahoo Mail to name a few) donâ€™t support custom fonts. Just wanted to let you know so your expectations are realistic. I typically advise people to go with a close default system font if they want the email to render consistently across inbox clients, and if something absolutely HAS to be on-brand typographically, to design that part of the email as an image to then be inserted as a JPG for example.
yes that's right I was also facing problems with fonts as old clients not support's.
If your still interested though I have helped a few companies implement a google custom font with a web safe font fallback.
